ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound frozen cooked, peeled, and deveined shrimp, thawed

cookingTips: Thaw shrimp slowly in the refrigerator for best texture; pat dry before mixing to avoid excess moisture
Use fresh dill for brightest flavor; add just before serving to prevent wilting and browning
Balance acidity by using both lemon zest and juice - zest adds texture while juice brightens the cream
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple Nordic salad highlights quality ingredients. Coach the user on selecting thawed shrimp and the importance of fresh herbs in light, acidic dressings.
